message: 'com.actionbarsherlock.R' should be separated from previous imports.
Method name not following naming convention - Name 'getResources_getBoolean' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Method name not following naming convention - Name 'getResources_getInteger' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
